public java.lang.String checkBidStatus(int lotId,
                                       java.lang.String email,
                                       int pin)
Check bid status for a particular lot

Parameters:
lotId - The id of the particular lot for which status requested
email - The email of the applicant
pin - The pin number of the applicant
Returns:
The status of the bid including amount, ranking among all submitted bids
